description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL cluster servers.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres cluster server list
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres cluster server list --cluster-name
                                         --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb postgres cluster server list --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres cluster server show
commands.summary: Get information about a node in cluster.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres cluster server show [--cluster-name]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--name]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]
examples: az cosmosdb postgres cluster server show -n "test-cluster-c" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"
